Description of incident: A tax preparer for Triangle Tax Services was found to have information in her possession for the purpose of identity theft.  A county deputy pulled the dishonest employee over for a traffic stop and found that she had checks, tax return credit cards, and handwritten names, dates of birth, and Social Security numbers.  She faces at least eight counts of identity theft; though it is unclear how many of her 300 potential victims are connected to Triangle Tax Services.
